1.title: Jauría de Perros
1.plot: While the family celebrates the youngest child's birthday with a pool party at home, a Spanish priest accused of collaborating with the resistance is tortured in the garage of the same house. Mary begins to stand out in the literary workshop that she frequents and her passion for literature is reborn. Coni has a secret romance hidden from her parents, while Simón, without realizing it, coexists with torture. Mike obtains the approval of the director of the intelligence service and will become the person in charge of carrying out the international political attacks of ...

2.title: Luna de miel en Palermo
2.plot: Mary and Mike travel together to Buenos Aires, to perpetrate their first attack. The victim, one of the political enemies of the Pinochet regime. For Mike it's the opportunity to move up in the intelligence service, for Mary to mix and transcend the limits of fiction with reality. While Mike has difficulty in carrying out his mission, Mary has an encounter with an old love of youth. In Santiago, their children take advantage of their absence, Coni starts her sexual awakening, while Simon tests his instincts. This chapter is inspired by the attack on Carlos Prats, ...

3.title: Ratas
3.plot: Mary receives a prestigious award for one of her stories. Meanwhile, Barrera is preparing a new lethal weapon to be used in Rome against another political adversary. An Italian terrorist visits Chile to perpetrate the next objective. An error and misunderstandings make the mission a failure, Mike must return to Chile. Mary must stay in Europe a couple of days, to not raise suspicion. When Mike arrives to Chile, he faces the fury of Sarmiento, and his daughter's boyfriend discover his true job. Mary disobeys the instructions and returns to Chile, while Mike seeks ...

4.title: Trópico de Cáncer
4.plot: Two Cuban anti-Castro run away to Chile after committing a wave of attacks and take refuge in Mike's home. Mike receives his old friends despite Mary's refusal. Mary meets a boy who catches her attention in the literary workshop, Mike suspects and spies on her. In the midst of a marriage crisis, no one notices that Coni, devastated by the sudden disappearance of Javier, has begun to approach dangerously to Aqueveque, product that her brother Simón has been suffering bullying in school. In the midst of the family storm, Mary will face a ruthless crime, while Mike will ...

5.title: Fiestas Patrias
5.plot: Orlando Letelier, former minister and ambassador of President Allende, leads the Chilean opposition from Washington D.C. Sarmiento thinks in a hit unprecedented and suicidal: go to the United States and get rid of Letelier. Mike assumes the mission with Monica, leaving Mary out of it. Mike must convince the anti-Castro Cubans to help them, but they still resent Mike's betrayal. Mary discovers that she was spied on and demands explanations from Sarmiento, who humiliates her by making her question about her literary talent. Meanwhile, in their own house, Coni, in a ...

6.title: Cerrar por fuera
6.plot: Letelier's crime has shaken the world and the regime suffers the first tumults of international pressure. Coinciding with the visit of the writer Jorge Luis Borges to the country, the US Attorney Eugene Roberts has traveled to Chile ready to take the killer of Letelier with him, even without knowing who it is. Sarmiento, desperate, executes a raid on all involved and Mike manages to escape thanks to the complicity of Monica. In the face of obvious danger, Mary takes their children out of the house and moves them quickly to the only safe place she can think: her maid's...

imdb.plot outline: Mary and Mike are a couple of elite agents from the Chilean secret police, DINA. Their job is to eliminate opposition leaders who from abroad articulate resistance to the fierce military dictatorship of Augusto Pinochet. In her public life, Mary is a writer and she relates with the most outstanding members of Santiago's cultural life. Mike, is a talented "gringo" for electronics. They live with their children Cony and Simon in the suburbs of Santiago where they tend to give crowded parties. But as they celebrate, in the backyard of their home they torture, murder and experiment with weapons of mass destruction.
imdb.title: Mary & Mike
plot: Mary and Mike are a couple of elite agents from the Chilean secret police, DINA. Their job is to eliminate opposition leaders who from abroad articulate resistance to the fierce military dictatorship of Augusto Pinochet. In her public life, Mary is a writer and she relates with the most outstanding members of Santiago's cultural life. Mike, is a talented "gringo" for electronics. They live with their children Cony and Simon in the suburbs of Santiago where they tend to give crowded parties. But as they celebrate, in the backyard of their home they torture, murder and experiment with weapons of mass destruction.::Invercine&Wood

Mary and Mike, agents' of the Chilean secret police, have to eliminate opposition leaders of dictatorship of Augusto Pinochet. While they seem to be a normal family, in their home they torture, murder and experiment with weapons of mass destruction.::Invercine&Wood
